meta.title: Creative Coding & Digital Animation Mastery - Complete Content Creator Course
meta.description: The most comprehensive 6-month creative coding and animation program. Master animation, video editing, motion graphics, social media content creation, visual effects, and creative programming. Create viral reels, stunning animations, and become a professional digital content creator.

program_overview.title: Creative Coding & Animation Mastery
program_overview.tagline: From Concept to Viral Content - Master Every Creative Tool
program_overview.description:
This intensive 6-month program transforms beginners into professional digital content creators and creative coders. Learn animation principles, master video editing, create viral social media content, and explore creative programming.

Students will master industry-standard tools like After Effects, Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Blender, Processing, and more. Create stunning animations, viral reels, motion graphics, and interactive art while building a professional portfolio that stands out in the creative industry.

learning_path.month_1: Fundamentals: Design, Animation Basics, Video Editing

month_1.title: Month 1: Creative Foundations & Video Editing Basics
month_1.description: Master design principles, animation fundamentals, and professional video editing.

week_1.title: Design Principles & Digital Art Basics
topics: Elements of design: line, shape, color, texture, space
Principles of design: balance, contrast, emphasis, movement
Color theory: RGB/CMYK, color harmony, psychology
File formats: when to use what

month_2.title: Month 2: Motion Graphics & After Effects Mastery
month_2.description: Master motion design, visual effects, and professional animation techniques.

month_3.title: Month 3: Creative Coding & Interactive Media
month_3.description: Master creative programming with Processing, p5.js, and interactive installations.

week_10.title: p5.js and Web-Based Creative Coding
topics: p5.js setup and differences from Processing

month_4.title: Month 4: 3D Animation & Advanced Visual Effects
month_4.description: Master 3D animation, advanced VFX, and professional post-production.

week_14.title: Character Animation & Rigging in 3D
topics: Physics simulation for cloth and hair

month_5.title: Month 5: Social Media Mastery & Platform Optimization
month_5.description: Master content creation for every platform, viral strategies, and audience growth.

month_6.title: Month 6: Professional Portfolio & Client Projects
month_6.description: Build professional portfolio, work on client projects, and launch your creative career.

essential_software: Adobe Creative Suite (After Effects, Premiere Pro, Photoshop, Illustrator)

hardware_recommendations.computer: 16GB RAM minimum, dedicated GPU, SSD storage
hardware_recommendations.tablet: iPad with Apple Pencil or equivalent
hardware_recommendations.optional: Green screen, ring light, tripod, gimbal
